February 7, 1956
National Association of Educational
Broadcasting
Washington, D. C.
Dear Sir:
We are planning to apply to FCC
very soon for a CP to build an edu¬
cational FM radio station. We would
greatly appreciate receiving all lit¬
erature and information from you re¬
lative to this type of broadcasting.
We have on hand practically all
of the equipment needed for the station
including a 250 watt BC-l-B General
Electric Transmitter.
We teach radio announcing, and I
have had broad experience in com¬
mercial AM radio from an executive
standpoint. Educational FM is new to
us, however, and we would appreciate
your counsel.
HEW/wm
